name: mount

mount verb
(INCREASE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 [ I ] to gradually increase, rise, or get bigger: The children's excitement is mounting as Christmas gets nearer.
More examplesFewer examplesTension was mounting as the minutes went by.They worked harder and harder as the debts mounted.As the excitement mounted, the children became noisier.Amidst mounting tension, tribal leaders have agreed to meet.Anxiety for the missing climbers is mounting.
